extDescription.message: A powerful mouse gesture extension with visual trail effects

optionsSubtitle.message: Configure your mouse gestures to enhance your browsing experience

customGesturesDescription.message: Record gestures through actual mouse operations, supports complex gesture combinations

recordingInstructions.message: Hold down the right mouse button and move the mouse to draw the gesture trail

recordingContinue.message: Continue moving the mouse to draw the gesture, release the right button to complete recording

recordingCompleteInstructions.message: Please set the gesture name and action, then save

footerVersion.message: Mouse Gestures v1.1.1 | Professional Mouse Gesture Tool

footerTip.message: üí° Tip: Complex gestures can combine multiple directions, such as ‚Üë‚Üí‚Üì or ‚Üê‚Üí‚Üê

extensionDisabledMessage.message: Click the switch above to enable extension features

helpStep1Detail.message: Hold down the right mouse button

helpStep2Detail.message: Keep the right button pressed, move the mouse to draw the gesture

helpStep3Detail.message: Release the right button, system recognizes and executes the corresponding action

visualTrail.message: Blue trail line shows mouse movement path

visualPattern.message: Screen center displays currently recognized gesture pattern

visualSuccess.message: Action name displayed after successful execution

customGestureFeatureDetail.message: Record exclusive gestures in settings center

sensitivityFeatureDetail.message: Adjust recognition sensitivity according to usage habits

statisticsFeatureDetail.message: View gesture usage frequency and preferences

unsupportedPageReason.message: Chrome built-in pages do not support gesture extension

messageGestureTooShort.message: Gesture too short, please draw a longer gesture

confirmDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this gesture?

noCustomGesturesHint.message: Click the button below to create your exclusive gesture

dragToCancelMotion.message: Drag to page edge to cancel motion

gestureDisabledSidepanel.message: Gesture feature is disabled (please close extension side panel)

patternNotFound.message: No action mapping found for pattern

unsupportedPageDefault.message: Current page does not support gesture extension

unsupportedPageChrome.message: Chrome built-in pages do not support gesture extension

unsupportedPageChromeHelp.message: Browser security policy restricts extensions from running on built-in pages.

unsupportedPageChromeExtension.message: Extension management pages do not support gesture functionality

unsupportedPageChromeExtensionHelp.message: Extensions cannot run on other extension pages.

unsupportedPageEdge.message: Edge built-in pages do not support gesture extension

unsupportedPageEdgeHelp.message: Browser security policy restricts extensions from running on built-in pages.

unsupportedPageAbout.message: Browser system pages do not support gesture functionality

unsupportedPageAboutHelp.message: Browser security policy restricts extensions from running on system pages.

unsupportedPageFile.message: Local files require additional authorization to use gesture functionality

unsupportedPageFileHelp.message:
üí° Solution:
1. Open chrome://extensions/
2. Find this extension and click "Details"
3. Enable "Allow access to file URLs" option
4. Refresh this page to use gesture functionality

rateExtensionMessage.message: Your 5-star review helps us reach more users and keep improving! It takes just a moment.
